p: The Medical Cannabis Network of Israel also reports that a current study is being undertaken by researchers at the Israel Institute of Technology investigating the therapeutic efficacy of a cannabis terpene inhalant formulation in suppressing the immune system response against COVID-19 [ 37]. A molecular docking analysis also reported the antiviral activity of Ginkgolide A, a terpenoid produced by the Ginkgo biloba tree, against COVID-19 [ 38].
